title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Ironically, searching for ways to be more grounded pushes you to do unusual things today. An extreme measure can reset your foundation since the creative Libra New Moon lands in your 4th House of Security. Of course, you cant take your coziest blanket to work, but you can consciously address your need for familiarity. Go out of your way to eat at your favorite restaurant or meet up with an old friend. Yielding to some of your feelings not only helps you be more productive now, but also soothes your soul. Rita Marley wrote, Who feels it, knows it. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
